name: Quicksilva
overview: A shareware game by Entactogenic Design, released in 1996. It was another normal day for Daisy, another day of eating grass when suddenly Daisy felt strange and looked at the mushrooms accusingly with rolling eyes. They got her jumping through the air. Sadly all this jumping led not only to Mad Cow Disease but to the first milkshake. Your local burger place is a ghost town and the government had to act quickly so they commissioned a robot, the Quicksilver to trace the roots of the craziness and eradicate it.
